thread.title: Arunachal ex-CM Thungon convicted for graft
thread.title_full: Arunachal ex-CM Thungon convicted for graft

author: IANS
title: Arunachal ex-CM Thungon convicted for graft
text: Moneylife Â» Arunachal ex-CM Thungon convicted for graft 42865 Arunachal ex-CM Thungon convicted for graft 0 Comments, Be the first to comment + COMMENT IANS | 21/07/2015 06:08 PM | A special court here has convicted former Arunachal Pradesh chief minister P.K. Thungon in a 1998 corruption case. Special CBI Judge Ajay Kumar Jain on Monday convicted Thungon and three others in the corruption case. The order became public on Tuesday. The court will hear arguments on the quantum of sentence on July 27. More in Moneylife
